text: Mildred Shahian is a former international table tennis player from the United States. ==Table tennis career== She won a World Championship gold medal in the Women's Team event at the 1949 World Table Tennis Championships for the united States. She also won an English Open title. ==Hall of Fame== She was inducted into the USA Hall of Fame in 1980. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:American female table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Mildred Shahian
